That's very nice of you Jeff.
Please keep us informed in the ITC group if y=
ou hear of any new
TOYS coming out....
Thanks for  the info

______________=
__________________

From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogrou=
ps.com] On Behalf
Of Marlboro63@...
Sent: Tuesday, August 12, 2008 1:37=
 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] THe Ovilus



Hi Deb=
bie,
 
The puck is not the same thing as the Ovilus 1.  The puck has to be
=
attached to a computer to be used.  The Ovilus 1 is a handeld device and
ne=
eds an external speaker.  I found out today that it appeared on
paranormal =
States but this device has been out for a few months now.
Unfortunately I h=
ave to sell some of my toys so I can purchase a few
more toys that are a bi=
t pricey.  These are the boss's rules so I have
to abide by them.  I could =
put it out there on Ebay but I wanted to give
someone here a chance to purc=
hase it for the price that I paid for it
rather than the price of a new one=
.
 
Jeff
 
In a message dated 8/12/2008 11:36:15 A.M. Central Standard Time=
,
debbie.fransen@... writes:

	

	
	Jeff,
	Do you know what the paran=
ormal puck is? Is it the same thing?
	How did you know about this Ovilus 1 =
before it was on Paranormal
State?
	Do- you -know-someone? Or are you invol=
ved in the making of
this?
	And what NEW TOYS are out there that we don't k=
now about?
	I have alot of questions don't I ? Can't help it........
	You c=
an sell it on ebay...... Why would you want to get rid of
it though, if it
=
	works?

________________________________

	From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [=
mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com]
On Behalf Of Marlboro63@...
	Sent: Tues=
day, August 12, 2008 12:30 PM
	To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
	Subject: Re: [E=
VP-ITC] THe Ovilus
	
	

	
	Hi Elabeth,
	 
	You have to remember much of wha=
t the Ovilus 1 said probably
ended up on the editing room floor.  But it do=
es work.  I get great
responses from mine.  The (7) different modes on it w=
ork very well.  But
if you know anyone who wants one please let me know.  I=
 was informed I
have to sell some of my toys to afford to buy new toys...LO=
LOL  I would
sell it for $165.00 and it is in brand new condition and only =
used a few
times.
	 
	Jeff
	 
	In a message dated 8/12/2008 11:24:20 A.M. C=
entral Standard
Time, elabeth@... writes:

		

		I thought it was pre=
tty neat that it repeated the word
"worry" when
		Ryan asked if it was worr=
ied they'd bring in a priest.
		What are the odds of that just based on env=
ironmental
readings? If I
		had an extra $200 laying around I'd be buying m=
yself one
to play with.
		~Elabeth
		
		On Tue, Aug 12, 2008 at 7:41 AM, Fr=
ansen, Debbie
		<debbie.fransen@...
<mailto:debbie.fransen%40delta.co=
m> > wrote:
		> I don't know how many of the members watch Paranormal
State=
, but they used
		> a new piece of equipment called The Ovilus. You guys
ha=
ve got to check this
		> out. Go to www.digitaldowsing.com. I am not really=

sure who these guys are,
		> and
		> where they came up with this. To me, =
it sounds kind of
like Frank's Box, but
		> not the same.
		> Frank, please=
 take a look at this, and tell us what
you think.
		> I don't understand ho=
w it works......
		> Deb
